item.title: Special Problem
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

Ok i added specials and i got this problem the specials only work on NPCS and not on players
here is the code i am using

[code]public void DDSSpecial()
{
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 )
{
staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(35);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(25);

    } else
    if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698   && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3))
    {
        int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
        int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
        int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
        SpecDamg(35);
    DDS2Damg = true;
    DDStimer = 1;
    staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
        startAnimation(0x426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;

    } else
    if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && !DDS)
    staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
        startAnimation(0x426);
        DDS = true;

}[/code]

my special bar didnt appear so i added it into an emote
on the pic i did it on the button O

public void emoteCheer() // { if(playerRights >= 0) { DDSSpecial(); sendMessage("test"); } }

please help
edit: picture of it no gfx it doesnt even hit the player
only npcs work
